name: AutoIt.de - Dark Grey (Experimental)
description: Experimental recoloring with some additional features for the shoutbox.
css: @namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml); @-moz-document url-prefix("http://autoit.de"), url-prefix("http://www.autoit.de") { body {background: #707070 !important;} .userPanelInner { background-image: linear-gradient(to top, #606060, #A0A0A0); color: #E0E0E0 !important;} .userPanelInner span { color: #E0E0E0 !important; } #userNote a { color: #880012 !important; font-weight: bold !important; } #box1,#box7,#box8,#box10,#box13,#box14,#box21,.shoutboxBox {box-shadow: 0 0 0.4em 0.1px #303030;} div.containerHead { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(45deg, transparent, transparent 15px, rgba(130,130,130,.3) 15px, rgba(130,130,130,.08) 30px) !important; background-color: #404040 !important; color: #F0F0F0 !important; } div.containerHead h3,div.containerHead a {text-shadow: none !important;} div.containerHead a {color: inherit !important;} div.containerHead:hover { background-image: repeating-linear-gradient(-45deg, transparent, transparent 15px, rgba(130,130,130,.08) 15px, rgba(130,130,130,.3) 30px) !important; } div.containerIcon {display: none;} span.emptyHead { background-image: linear-gradient(to top, #A0A0A0, #808080); color: #F0F0F0 !important; border-bottom-color: transparent !important; } tr.container-1,tr.container-2 {transition-duration: 0.3s} .firstPost.light {color: #404040 !important;} tr.container-1 {background-color: #E0E0E0 !important;} tr.container-2 {background-color: #D0D0D0 !important;} tr.container-1:hover,tr.container-2:hover { background-color: #F0F0F0 !important; background-image: none !important; text-shadow: #404040 3px 0 3px; } #shoutboxContent p {transition-duration: 1.5s; transition-delay: 0.1s;} #shoutboxContent p:hover {background-color: #D0D0D0 !important;} #shoutboxContent p:nth-child(even) { background-color: #F0F0F0; } #shoutboxContent { min-height: 300px; } #shoutboxContent .resizeImage { max-width: 80px; max-height: 50px; transition: all 1s ease-in-out 0.3s; } #shoutboxContent .resizeImage:hover { max-height: 100%; max-width: 100%; } .prefix {color: rgb(210,120,0);} div#customBox214 div.containerContent { margin: 0px !important; padding: 0px !important; } div#customBox214 * { background-color: #909090 !important; border: 0px !important; } } @-moz-document url("http://translation.autoit.de/autoitinfo/autoit_downloads.php") { body{ background-color: #909090 !important; color: #303030; } body>div:nth-child(even) { background-color: #C0C0C0 !important; color: #FFFFFF !important;} body>div:nth-child(odd) { background-color: #FFFFFF !important; } body>div:last-child { background-color: transparent !important; color: #F0F0F0 !important; } }
